name: DreamVision Network
description: DREAM is a sovereign SPL token built on the Solana blockchain, powering the DreamVision Network Protocol and its ecosystem of decentralized applications. With a fixed supply and revoked mint authority, DREAM represents trustless ownership, long-term vision, and ceremonial integrity. It serves as the foundational asset for protocol governance, liquidity provisioning, and community engagement across all layers of the DreamVision architecture.
